meanings.definition: Containing more than one type of grain.
meanings.sent1: The bakery offers a delicious multigrain bread.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the nutty flavor of multigrain cereal.
meanings.sent3: The multigrain sandwich was so packed with grains, it could feed a small village!
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was like a multigrain buffet, with a mix of colors and textures.
meanings.sent5: The multigrain fields stretched as far as the eye could see, a patchwork of different grains.

meanings.definition: Made with a variety of grains.
meanings.sent1: The multigrain muffins were a hit at the bake sale.
meanings.sent2: We bought a loaf of multigrain bread for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The multigrain pizza was a quirky twist on traditional toppings.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was like a multigrain masterpiece, blending different techniques seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The multigrain soup warmed us up on a cold winter day, each grain adding a unique touch.
